name: Squirrel clicker
description:
Do you have enough speed and patience to earn enough nuts? Can you provide a decent life for a squirrel? Press without stopping and chop your nutty state! Can't you be a millionaire yourself? Then help the squirrel to create their own corporation and rise from the bottom!
Manage the nuts and come to the victorious end! Reach the top of the squirrel kingdom! Check yourself - can you unlock a nut factory?

- Click on a squirrel and earn nuts
- Buy upgrades to earn MORE nuts
- Hire forest animals to earn MUCH MORE nuts even when you're offline
- Take the path from ordinary forest squirrels to squirrels - the owner of the plant!

Download the clicker game for free and become a nutty magnate!

Sign in to Google Play Games to play with your friends and compare the results!
